entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow or ice pellets early this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of snow or ice pellets late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
